ovdesc.p: This ‘T’ table contains the list of Creditor Id's provded under each customer for SEPA processing.
This concat table is written on authorisation of Customer record and if the value of CreditorID is provided in the Customer application
This table used to check if the creditorId part in SEPA.MANDATE record key is valid for mandate created for Outward Transaction

desc.p: This field holds the value of the Customer record Key under which the current Creditor Id is provided.
